author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
summary: ...DALILA'S OUTER RAINBANDS AFFECTING SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 15:00 UTC SAT JUN 14 2025 the center of Dalila was located near 16.5, -104.8 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 996 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Dalila (EP4/EP042025)
